verses.t: Now{G1161} I{G1473} Paul{G3972} myself{G846} beseech{G3870} you{G5209} by{G1223} the meekness{G3588} and{G2532} gentleness{G1932} of Christ{G3588}, who{G3739} in{G2596} presence{G4383} am base{G5011} among{G1722} you{G5213}, but{G1161} being absent{G548} am bold{G2292} toward{G1519} you{G5209}:

But{G1161} I beseech{G1189} you, that I may{G2292} not{G3361} be bold{G2292} when I am present{G3918} with that confidence{G3588}, wherewith I think{G3049} to be bold{G5111} against{G1909} some{G5100}, which{G3739} think{G3049} of us{G2248} as if{G5613} we walked{G4043} according to{G2596} the flesh{G4561}.
For{G1063} though we walk{G4043} in{G1722} the flesh{G4561}, we do{G4754} not{G3756} war{G4754} after{G2596} the flesh{G4561}:
(For{G1063} the weapons{G3696} of our{G2257} warfare{G3588} are not{G3756} carnal{G4559}, but{G235} mighty{G1415} through God{G3588} to{G4314} the pulling down{G2506} of strong holds{G3794};)

Casting down{G2507} imaginations{G3053}, and{G2532} every{G3956} high thing{G5313} that exalteth itself{G1869} against{G2596} the knowledge{G3588} of God{G3588}, and{G2532} bringing into captivity{G163} every{G3956} thought{G3540} to{G1519} the obedience{G3588} of Christ{G3588};
And{G2532} having{G2192} in{G1722} a readiness{G2092} to revenge{G1556} all{G3956} disobedience{G3876}, when{G3752} your{G5216} obedience{G3588} is fulfilled{G4137}.

Do ye look{G991} on things{G3588} after{G2596} the outward appearance{G4383}? If{G1487} any man{G5100} trust{G3982} to himself{G1438} that he is{G1511} Christ's{G5547}, let him{G3049} of{G575} himself{G1438} think{G3049} this{G5124} again{G3825}, that{G3754}, as{G2531} he{G846} is Christ's{G5547}, even{G2532} so{G3779} are we{G2249} Christ's{G5547}.

For{G1063} though{G1437} I should boast{G2744} somewhat{G5100} more{G4053} of{G4012} our{G2257} authority{G3588}, which{G3739} the Lord{G3588} hath given{G1325} us{G2254}for{G1519} edification{G3619}, and{G2532} not{G3756} for{G1519} your{G5216} destruction{G2506}, I should{G153} not{G3756} be ashamed{G153}:
That{G2443} I may{G1380} not{G3361} seem{G1380} as{G5613} if{G302} I would terrify{G1629} you{G5209} by{G1223} letters{G3588}.

For{G3754} his letters{G1992}, say they{G5346}, are weighty{G926} and{G2532} powerful{G2478}; but{G1161} his bodily{G3588} presence{G3952} is weak{G772}, and{G2532} his speech{G3588} contemptible{G1848}.

Let{G3049} such an one{G5108} think{G3049} this{G5124}, that{G3754}, such as{G3634} we are{G2070} in word{G3588} by{G1223} letters{G1992} when we are absent{G548}, such{G5108} will we be also{G2532} in deed{G3588} when we are present{G3918}.

For{G1063} we dare{G5111} not{G3756} make ourselves of the number{G1469}, or{G2228} compare{G4793} ourselves{G1438} with some{G5100} that commend{G4921} themselves{G1438}: but{G235} they{G846} measuring{G3354} themselves{G1438} by{G1722} themselves{G1438}, and{G2532} comparing{G4793} themselves{G1438} among themselves{G1438}, are{G4920} not{G3756} wise{G4920}.

But{G1161} we{G2249} will{G2744} not{G3780} boast{G2744} of{G1519} things{G3588} without{G280} our measure{G280}, but{G235} according to{G2596} the measure{G3588} of the rule{G3588} which{G3739} God{G3588} hath distributed{G3307} to us{G2254}, a measure{G3358} to reach{G2185} even{G2532} unto{G891} you{G5216}.

For{G1063} we stretch{G5239} not{G3756} ourselves{G1438} beyond{G5239} our measure, as though{G5613} we reached{G2185} not{G3361} unto{G1519} you{G5209}: for{G1063} we are come{G5348} as far as{G891} to you{G5216} also{G2532} in{G1722} preaching the gospel{G3588} of Christ{G3588}:

Not{G3756} boasting{G2744} of{G1519} things{G3588} without{G280} our measure{G280}, that is, of{G1722} other men's{G245} labours{G2873}; but{G1161} having{G2192} hope{G1680}, when your{G5216} faith{G3588} is increased{G837}, that we shall be enlarged{G3170} by{G1722} you{G5213} according{G2596} to{G1519} our{G2257} rule{G3588} abundantly{G4050},

To preach the gospel{G2097} in{G1519} the{G5238} regions beyond{G5238} you{G5216}, and not{G3756} to boast{G2744} in{G1722} another man's{G245} line of things{G2583} made ready{G2092} to{G1519} our hand{G2092}.
But{G1161} he{G3588} that glorieth{G2744}, let him glory{G2744} in{G1722} the Lord{G2962}.
For{G1063} not{G3756} he that{G1565} commendeth{G4921} himself{G1438} is{G2076} approved{G1384}, but{G235} whom{G3739} the Lord{G3588} commendeth{G4921}.
